::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus struggles to look up at Cyclonus. He tries to activate his optics lasers but there no energy left and they fizzle out. He head slumps again. Rodimus Prime has indeed been beaten.

OOC: Time for the plan Super Cyc.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus tries to activate his boosters to rise at Cyclonus but he is
 > not quick enough. The electrical pulse strikes the area where Rodimus
 > was lifting off and the surge shocks Rodimus. The energy travels
 > through his systems and Rodimus cries out in pain and drops to his
 > knees. Smoke is coming from his armor in multiple places. Rodimus
 > looks down exhausted. His energon reserves are nearly spent.
 
 Cyclonus hovers before the apparently exahausted Rodimus Prime, his
 hand cannons and shoulder mounted oxidation cannons ready to fire. Yet
 even as he about to fire something appears in his optics, perhaps
 respect for a fallen warrior, perhaps something else entirely. Whatever
 it is, despite his own battle damage and energy loss, he pauses to
 speak, "You have lost Rodimus Prime." 
 
 He again focuses his hand cannons on Rodimus even as his shoulder
 cannons shut down, his hand cannons turn black again as they prepare to
 fire ...
 
 Preston
 (Cyclonus)
